title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Aerosoft CRJ - Load flight plan and still use the ATC
description:
In this video we will have a look at how you can load a flight plan in the Aerosoft CRJ. As you might know loading the flight plan the normal way (via the World map) does not work for this aircraft. But there is a workaround that allows you both to load the flight plan but still use the ATC from MSFS 2020.
